short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch videos of wisdom during ad breaks on OTT platforms and YouTube for self growth.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the ad breaks as a means for self-growth. The extension works on major OTT platforms in India like Hotstar, Sony Liv, etc, and the popular video platform YouTube. By default, the extension during ad breaks shows simple conscious changes you can bring into your life.

This extension also has a feature to watch a custom video during Ad breaks, like your lectures, while watching live streams for long test cricket matches, favourite songs, etc. The settings for the extension can be updated in the extension pop-up.

For feedback, suggestions, and feature requests, kindly contact support@adswapper.in
